title: Leveraging Vision-Language Embeddings for Zero-Shot Learning in Histopathology Images
details: MM Rahaman, EKA Millar, E Meijering - arXiv preprint arXiv:2503.10731, 2025
abstract: Zero-shot learning holds tremendous potential for histopathology image analysis by enabling models to generalize to unseen classes without extensive labeled data. Recent advancements in vision-language models (VLMs) have expanded the …
